meanings.definition: A group of four people working together or ruling jointly.
meanings.sent1: The quadrumvirates discussed their plans for the project.
meanings.sent2: The quadrumvirates made decisions together to ensure fairness.
meanings.sent3: The quadrumvirates tried to agree on a pizza topping, but it was a challenge.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship formed a quadrumvirates bond that could not be broken.
meanings.sent5: The quadrumvirates stood united, each bringing a unique perspective to the table.

meanings.definition: The office or term of office of a quadrumvirate.
meanings.sent1: She was elected to the quadrumvirates and took her responsibilities seriously.
meanings.sent2: The quadrumvirates met weekly to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent3: The quadrumvirates office had a beautiful view of the city skyline.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the quadrumvirates term was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The quadrumvirates term was marked by progress and collaboration.
